title: Dragonhaze: A Dragonhall Chronicles novel
description: In Dargyn, magic is forbidden.The penalty for using it is death.As a rider of one of the great dragons, Kaida's job is to uphold the law, even if the magic-user is her son. After her former husband turns their son in to the authorities, Kaida finds herself torn between duty to her country and loyalty to her only child.One choice could cost her son his life.The other could kill her, and her dragon.Get it now.
author: Mirren Hogan
